body:
I'm trying to move my Sunpath using sunPathCenPts so I can position it relative to other objects but when I connect a wire from Move and attempt to use Unit Z vector all I see is an X move up and down - the sunpath stays in place. Thanks.

[Sunpath.JPG](http://api.ning.com:80/files/bt5BWlmh0GbzcD5gZghEBfkfewO8hxVRPKEo9n*iEAdP5j3JTqmtSyuJEpq9oBRkVvaq-9A53DXLri08loGRJLGyZAq-hOur/Sunpath.JPG)

replies.body:
Chris,

It won't be easier to input in the Sunpath component a CenterPoint?

I think this is what you want to do ...

-A.

Hi Chris, Check the attached fie for an example. You need to connect the new point to sunPathCenPt input. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/bt5BWlmh0GaO6GwoxZh8FyaKPj0a2PUBCEuVMwS40VKv85pvOay*G*xwgOdmz-vR-QQeTAMmutx-ZUtOEWG4Edhjv*6W*bsq/movingSunPath.png)
PS: This is basically what Abraham
